Final Inspection

Fire and Safety, LLC

Our Team

Final Inspection Fire & Safety, LLC, located in Odessa, Texas would like to take this time to graciously introduce ourselves:

"Our senior staff has a combined 30 years experience in the field of Fire and Life Safety Inspections and Training."

The Final Inspection team are Texas Certified Peace Officers and Texas Commission on Fire Protection certified Fire Inspectors.

Final Inspection team provides an assortment of fire inspection related services for homes, businesses, safety trainings for small or large businesses, code consultation for new construction and developments, including outsourcing projects and meeting the needs of growing municipalities and institutions in your community.

"We look forward to working with you to help assist in meeting your specific needs to ensure fire safety in all environments."

Plan Review

Municipalities can contract with us or direct all fees and plan submissions directly to us.

Plan review includes stamp plans with comments and an open line of communication.

Municipalities will receive code compliant plans pertaining to fire protection such as Automatic Sprinkler Systems, Fire Alarm Systems, and Passive Fire Protection for any project without any overhead.

Contact us so we can discuss an arrangement that will work best for your organization.

*Contact us to establish a safe work environment or to ensure compliance with regulatory agencies, local codes, and insurance requirements*

Plan reviews are available for the following disciplines:

• Automatic Sprinkler Systems
• Standpipes
• Fire Alarm Systems
• Hazardous Material Storage
• High Piled Storage
• Kitchen Suppression System
• Clean Agent System
• Fire Apparatus Access Roads
• Residential
• Passive Fire Protection
• Paint Spray Booth
• Commercial Building Plan Reviews for Exit Egress
